## What does this do?

Explain what you changed and why. Don't stress about being super technical - just tell me what's different now.

## Type of change

- [ ] Bug fix (I fixed something that was broken)
- [ ] New feature (I added something cool)
- [ ] New website support (I made it work on a new site!)
- [ ] Breaking change (this might break stuff for some people - hopefully not tho)
- [ ] Code cleanup (I made the code prettier/better)
- [ ] Performance improvement (I made it faster)
- [ ] Documentation (I updated the docs/readme)

## Related issues

Fixes #(issue number if this fixes a bug someone reported)
Related to #(if it's related to another issue)

## What changed?

List what's different:

- (Like "Fixed YouTube downloads")
- (Or "Added support for Vimeo")
- (Or "Made the popup look better")

## Websites affected

If this change affects specific websites, list them:

- (Like "YouTube" or "Instagram" or "All sites")

## Testing

### Browsers I tested

Check off what you tested it on (at least test Chrome OR Firefox):

- [ ] Chrome/Chromium
- [ ] Firefox
- [ ] Edge
- [ ] Brave
- [ ] Other:

### What I tested

Just tell me what you did to test it:

1. (Like "I tried downloading a video from YouTube")
2. (And "I tested it with a photo from Instagram")
3. (You get the idea)

### Did it work?

Yeah? Awesome! If you have screenshots or a video showing it working, drop them below (just drag and drop the files).

## Checklist

Just check off what applies (don't worry if you don't know what some of these mean):

- [ ] I tested it and it works
- [ ] I didn't break anything else (hopefully)
- [ ] I tested on at least one browser
- [ ] If I added a new site, I listed it above

## Screenshots/Videos

Show me what you did! (Drag and drop images/videos here - it's easier than you think)

## Notes

Anything else I should know? Any weird quirks or issues you ran into?
